error_messages.403: The joke service is refusing to respond to your request.
error_messages.404: The requested action could not be performed. The joke service has been permanently removed.
error_messages.429: You are accessing the joke service too frequently, please try again in a little while.
error_messages.500: The requested action could not be performed, the joke service experienced an unknown error. Please try again.
error_messages.523: The requested action could not be performed, the joke service may be down or experiencing issues. Please try again in a little while.
error_messages.default: A problem occurred accessing the joke service.
